introduction.description:
I'm a Unity developer with skills in 3D modeling using Blender. I also compose some soundtracks using FamiStudio software, just as a hobby.

Feel free to click on the cards to get information about my skills or check out my projects by scrolling down or directly in the navigation menu.

csharp.title: C# Programming Language
csharp.modal:
I have skills with the C# programming language focused on game development with Unity.
You can check out my games in the games section.

unity.title: Unity
unity.modal:
I have knowledge of development using Unity and C#, creating various mechanics for 2D and 3D games.
I've developed a variety of games during my journey as a game developer.

githubdesktop.title: GitHub Desktop
githubdesktop.modal: I have knowledge using GitHub Desktop for versioning my projects, allowing saving its state with each commit and also making a nice teamwork.

visualstudio.title: Visual Studio
visualstudio.modal: I use Visual Studio as my main IDE to work on my projects with Unity.

blender.title: Blender
blender.modal: I have 3D modeling skills using Blender software. From modeling to texturing and rendering, I've created various 3D models with low polygon counts to be optimized in real-time applications.

famistudio.title: FamiStudio
famistudio.modal:
FamiStudio is an open-source software with a DAW-like interface for creating chiptunes for NES.
I create some retro-style soundtracks as a hobby and you can listen to them in the soundtracks section.

html.title: HTML5
html.modal: I have skills with HTML5 and this portfolio is living proof of that. I created it using HTML5 + Bootstrap and some custom stylings with CSS.

css.title: CSS
css.modal: I have skills with CSS that allow me to create custom stylings or even small animations.

bootstrap.title: Bootstrap
bootstrap.modal: I have skills with the Bootstrap framework, which facilitates front-end development and it is used in this site.

games.title: My Games
games.description: This section contains some of the games I developed using the Unity game engine.

pixel2d.description:
Pixel 2D Platformer is a simple 2D platformer game where you pass through enemies and obstacles to progress to the next level.
It's my first game to publish on the Play Store.

sharperfps.description: This is a first-person shooter game where your goal is to eliminate all soldiers in the level with your only three weapons.

piecearena.description: Piece Arena is a multiplayer game developed by me, Felipe, Jhones and Pedro for the FIAP Challenge with Fanatee, it was the top 1 of the Challenge.

csjmultiplayer.description: This is a simple 2D multiplayer shooting game developed with the aim of studying the Photon Network.

runoverzombies.description: Run Over Zombies is an infinity runner style game, where the goal is to run over zombies on the road and avoid pedestrians. It was developed during DevJam2, where the theme was Infinite Loop.

spaceshipshooter.description: This is an infinite spaceship game, where you explode enemy spaceships. I developed it alone during my early studies with Unity.
